evidence.claim: Vecna utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure services.
FHIR and HL7 standards are part of Vecna's health technology framework.
Vecna integrates EHR systems using X12 transaction sets for healthcare data exchange.
The company employs Kafka for data streaming across its platforms.
Vecna supports webhook integrations for real-time data processing.

icp.icp_reason: Vecna uses X12 and EDI for healthcare data exchange, aligning well with our target ICP.
